attributes.action: prevent Lord Mandleson from bypassing the democratic process of this country by using a Statutory Instrument to hand control of the Internet to unelected and un-policed organisations who will act as judge and jury over matters of intellectual property infringement, thereby criminalising breach of copyright – potentially making the reading of a newspaper online a criminal act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lord Mandleson is looking to use a Statutory Instrument (completely bypassing the normal, democratic law making process, and handing control of the internet to unpoliced organisations such as FAST and the BPI.

They will be judge and jury in any case where an individul is suspected of downloading copywrited material.

You could be criminalised for reading a newspaper on line
